dcterms:description: SG-FRONT dataset extends the original 3D-FRONT dataset with paired scene graph annotations, covering three room types of indoor scenes: bedrooms, dining rooms, and living rooms, with a total of 45K object samples.
dcterms:title: SG-FRONT

dcterms:description: 3D-FRONT dataset contains 3D furnished rooms with layouts and semantics, providing a comprehensive resource for 3D scene understanding and generation.

dcterms:description: ShapeNet is an information-rich 3D model repository that provides a large collection of 3D shapes for various applications in computer vision and graphics.
